summary.name: Victrola Journey+ Bluetooth Suitcase Record Player, Turquoise
summary.description:
The Victrola Journey+ Bluetooth Suitcase Record Player in Turquoise is a portable turntable with a retro-inspired design. It features a turquoise color scheme that adds a distinct aesthetic appeal.

Functionally, it offers Bluetooth connectivity, allowing users to stream music wirelessly from their smartphones or other compatible devices. The turntable supports three-speed settings (33 1/3, 45, and 78 RPM) to accommodate various vinyl formats. Additionally, it includes built-in stereo speakers for convenient playback without the need for external amplifiers or speakers, although it also offers RCA output jacks for connecting to external audio equipment if desired.

Overall, the Victrola Journey+ Bluetooth Suitcase Record Player provides a combination of vintage charm and modern convenience, suitable for both vinyl enthusiasts and casual listeners looking for a portable playback option.

overview.name: Huizhou Ruiya Technology Co., Ltd.
overview.description: Huizhou Ruiya Technology Co., Ltd., based in Guangdong, China, is a manufacturer and trading company. Their business range encompasses arts & crafts, computer products, construction & decoration, and consumer electronics. Specializing in high-quality audio equipment, their main products include record players, gramophones, phonographs, vinyl players, and multi-turntable vinyl players.

overview.name: Deer Park Distributors LLC
overview.description: Distribution center for Crosleys and other turntables. Potential distribution center for Victrola turntables as well. Deer Park Distributors, LLC is the exclusive distributor of Crosley Radio, a family-owned business with roots tracing back to 1938. Located in Brownstown, IL, they specialize in wholesale accounts, drop shipping, and inventory fulfillment services for e-commerce and retail stores.
